@toaster man - No shit lol. I remember when I was talking to two lolicons, one of them was straight up encouraging me to kill myself and started sending me death threats, though they deleted the threats, and pretty much started acting like the usual,  toxic troll. I got banned, but they didn't even get their comments deleted. There is definitely a bias here, and it's not just from these two cases alone.

@toaster man - that's the part that confuses me. It's taken them like, days to ban my accounts. DETROID_NTR 2.0 was slain after a whole week of activity, and that wasn't until I started playing along with throwing insults and wishing death on certain people. Not even 2 hours later, it was banned. 3.0 was going strong for almost 2 days before it was banned. Like, you'd think it would have gotten banned overnight when I was making a bunch of comments here, describing the secret group of scumbags that wish to go back to the era of lords and peasants, but they seemed to have banned it after I made a comment talking about how the Naruto doujin, currently at popular, didn't deserve to be in it due to its mediocre art and crappy story. Idk, maybe they only ban for specific reasons, or maybe they're just lazy. Idk.
From what I've seen it also seems like this website takes a special liking to lolicons and is less likely to mute them even when they fight or get up to mischief.

@DETROID_NTR yeah probably. And don't worry i did read your last comments before they were muted, and I agreed for the most part. I've never thought much about alternate realities but what you said sounded about right. What I was talking about was higher and lower dimensions not other versions of our reality. Btw if you don't want to keep getting muted i suggest changing your name because I've got a hunch this website or mods are more likely to mute accounts with the same name as accounts that have been muted before.

Reality is made up of multiple layers but humans can only perceive the layer we're physically in now for the most part while viewing the world through the 5 senses provided by the body but if you can get into a place not ruled by the 5 senses (like a lucid dream or a heavy psychedelic trip) you can then (if you know what your doing or are lucky) view the other levels of reality, each level is but one piece of what the greater reality is made of. the greater reality is something that cannot be seen all at once with the human mind, it's just too much, you can glimpse it for a short time maybe if you play your cards just right but it nearly destroys your mind doing so. but if you know what your doing you can look at each level separately and contact the entities that live in the different levels.

@machan12 Right, I also prefer the consistency. I just ask because there's like 3 sizes for moans and grunts (so 'loud' you HAVE to translate, medium noises that are hard to ignore, and small stifles to represent every breathe). Almost no one without a team translates the small stifles and much less the sfx, so I'm mainly conflicted with the medium sized oohs and ahs.
@mickeyj I prefer it for consistency's sake, but if you prefer it for speed's sake, that's fine too.

Translator here. Real talk, I gotta ask you guys something: Do you fucking care if moans are translated or not? I feel like even without knowing Japanese, most people should be able to get the idea, especially since the hiragana characters actually the same as the sound they're making (eg あ looks like it has an 'A'). If people care, I'll keep translating them, but editing would be faster for these small projects if I just knew nobody cared.

Fun and no responsibility
